message.content:
{"id": "18268", "title": "Bug 18268: Images and files not found in NL-specific subdirectories", "description": "When starting Eclipse, images and files in NL-specific subdirectories are not being found. Here are the steps to reproduce the issue:

1. Start Eclipse.
2. Delete <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif.
3. Edit <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini and change the value of the aboutImage property to aboutImage=$nl$/eclipselg.gif.
4. Edit <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini and change the value of the aboutImage property to aboutImage=nl/en/eclipselg.gif.
5. Open the about dialog.

Actual Result:
There is no main image displayed.

Expected Result:
There should be a main image displayed indicating that the UI is passing the correct path to IPluginDescriptor.find.

It appears that the problem lies with the handling of the '$nl$' path segment.", "OB": "The main image is not displayed in the about dialog.", "EB": "The main image should be displayed in the about dialog when the correct path is passed to IPluginDescriptor.find.", "SR": "To resolve this issue, please follow the steps below:

1. Exit Eclipse.
2. Copy the file <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif into an NL-specific subdirectory such as <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/nl/en/eclipselg.gif.
3. Start Eclipse again."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '18268', 'title': 'Bug 18268not finding images and files in NLspecific subdirectories', 'description': 'Bug 18268not finding images and files in NLspecific subdirectories build 200205291235Setup Start eclipse. Delete <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif3. Edit <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.iniChange the value of the aboutImage property:aboutImage=$nl$/eclipselg.gif4. Edit <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.iniChange the value of the aboutImage property:aboutImage=nl/en/eclipselg.gif7. Open the about dialogObserve: There is a main image again.This suggests that the UI is correctly passing the entire pathto IPluginDescriptor.find, but that the "$nl$" path segment is not beinghandled correctly. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'Exit eclipse.1. Copy the file <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gifdown into an NLspecific subdirectory; i.e., move it to<install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/nl/en/eclipselg.gif2. Start eclipse5. Start eclipse8. '}
